text: Hum ney (hazrat) musa ko kitab di aur inn kay peechay aur rasool bhejay aur hum ney (hazrat) essa ibn-e-marium ko roshan daleelen din aur rooh-ul-qudus say unn ki taeed kerwaee. Lekin jab kabhi tumharay pass rasool woh cheez laye jo tumhari tabiyaton kay khilaf thi tum ney jhat say takabbur kiya pus baaz ko to jhutla diya aur baaz ko qatal bhi ker dala
